bibl.title: Roman Game Boards from Abu Sha'ar (Red Sea Coast, Egypt).
bibl.note: University of Delaware, survey and excavations, 1987-1993. 20 game boards from the Roman fort, 4th cent. A.D. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 76 (2007) No. 9150.
bibl.seg: MULVIN Lynda and Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM, Roman Game Boards from Abu Sha'ar (Red Sea Coast, Egypt).
Antiquity 78 (2004) No. 301, pp. 602-617, figg., 1 carte, 1 plan.
University of Delaware, survey and excavations, 1987-1993. 20 game boards from the Roman fort, 4th cent. A.D. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 76 (2007) No. 9150.
